pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power-Enhanced (PE) Tests for High-Dimensional Data // Two-sample power-enhanced mean tests, covariance tests, and simultaneous tests on mean vectors and covariance matrices for high- dimensional data. Methods of these PE tests are presented in Yu, Li, and Xue (2022) doi:10.1080/01621459.2022.2126781; Yu, Li, Xue, and Li (2022) doi:10.1080/01621459.2022.2061354.
